reviewText: Very nice, beautiful and informative DVD. If you love New England, if you love history, if you love covered bridges... this DVD is for you! Great! My highest recommendation!

I own a copy of this video and watched it again this morning. It is really a good one, with human interest
stories and lots of photos of pretty bridges, that I probably will never see in person, since I do not live in New England.
Would recommend this to anyone with an interest in well-built covered bridges, and interviews with those who live nearby,
and love them for many reasons.  Many or most of these bridges are still in use, and are well maintained!!
Enlightening stories and beautiful photography. This program is a walk back to another time. Check out the video clip and see for yourself.
